{{Description|Experience Floral Chess, a new game created by the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild.}}

'''Floral Pursuit''' is a part of the [[Windblume's Breath]] event in [[Version 3.5]]. Complete ''[[Floral Pursuit]]'' to unlock this event segment.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit 1.png
|text1  = After the Floral Pursuit challenge begins, you must constantly {{Color|help|collect Bloom Balloons}} to increase your score. The next area will unlock only after you have collected a specific number of Bloom Balloons.<br>After you have collected a specific number of Bloom Balloons in the final area, a {{Color|help|Ring of Pursuit}} will appear and you can touch it to end this challenge.
|image2 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit 2.png
|text2  = Ersatz Balloons will pursue you within the challenge area. {{Color|help|You must avoid the Ersatz Balloons}}. If you are caught by one such Balloon, you will {{Color|help|lose 1 Pursuit Point}}, and you will be returned to the start point of this area.
|image3 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit 3.png
|text3  = Bloom Balloons and Ersatz Balloons will both be displayed on the minimap in the top left corner. You can adjust the display size of the minimap and its rotation.
|image4 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit 4.png
|text4  = You can join Co-Op Mode as a single player. If you are already in Co-Op Mode, you can invite a player from your party to play together.
}}

;Ordered Wind
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit Ordered Wind 1.png
|text1  = Collecting Galeblessings can help charge up the Ersatz Dispeller skill. After using Ersatz Dispeller, you will be able to destroy all Ersatz Balloons you touch for 7s.
|image2 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit Ordered Wind 2.png
|text2  = After collecting a Gatherblessing, your collection range for Bloom Balloons will be expanded for 10s.
}}

;Obstructing Wind
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit Obstructing Wind 1.png
|text1  = In this challenge, shifting the positions of some bookcases will open or close some additional paths...
}}

;Shimmering Wind
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Windblumes Breath Floral Pursuit Shimmering Wind 1.png
|text1  = Some areas of the challenge will be in a darkened state. After activating the light sources for these areas, brightness will return and new Bloom Balloons will appear.
}}

==Challenges==
* The challenges need to be completed in successive order.
